question.text: <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> has antifluorite structure (<math> <mtext>B</mtext> </math> forms <math> <mrow> <mtext>FCC</mtext></mrow> </math> lattice and <math> <mtext>A</mtext> </math> occupies tetrahedral voids). If all ions along any one body diagonal are removed, then new formula of compound will be:

solution.text: On one body diagonal, <math> <mrow>  <mtext>2</mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></math>-atoms(full contribution) <math> <mrow>  <mtext>2</mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></math>-atoms <math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></mrow></mfenced></math> lie. So, new formula = <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msub></math>
